text: KFTN-LP (92.7 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Fenton, Missouri. The station is owned by the Rockwood Schooll District. It airs a classic rock format. The station was assigned the KFTN-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on March 14, 2014. It was only the second high school radio station in Missouri to receive an FCC license. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FTN-LP FTN-LP Category:High school radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Missouri Category:Classic rock radio stations in the United States Category:St. Louis County, Missouri
title: KFTN-LP
